noun.description: A pillow or pad stuffed with a mass of soft material, used as a comfortable support for sitting or leaning on.

verb.description: Soften the effect of an impact on.
examples: the bag cushions equipment from inevitable knocks

origin: Middle English: from Old French cuissin, based on a Latin word meaning cushion for the hip, from coxa hip, thigh. The Romans also had a word cubital elbow cushion, from cubitus elbow.
